thread.title: California Community Foundation pledges $1 billion to L.A. County nonprofits
thread.title_full: California Community Foundation pledges $1 billion to L.A. County nonprofits - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: California Community Foundation pledges $1 billion to L.A. County nonprofits
text: Alice WaltonContact Reporter In celebration of its 100th anniversary, the California Community Foundation is pledging $1 billion to Los Angeles County 's nonprofit organizations over the next decade. The funding announcement follows a survey
